name: core::num::flt2dec::to_exact_exp_str
src:
pub fn to_exact_exp_str<'a, T, F>(
    mut format_exact: F,
    v: T,
    sign: Sign,
    ndigits: usize,
    upper: bool,
    buf: &'a mut [MaybeUninit<u8>],
    parts: &'a mut [MaybeUninit<Part<'a>>],
) -> Formatted<'a>
where
    T: DecodableFloat,
    F: FnMut(&Decoded, &'a mut [MaybeUninit<u8>], i16) -> (&'a [u8], i16),
